mapper.update:
update BOT_UNAWARE_DETAIL
NODE_ID = #{nodeId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
SERVER_ID = #{serverId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
SERVER_NAME = #{serverName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
REQUEST_ID = #{requestId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
AUTH_VENDOR = #{authVendor,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MESSAGE_ID = #{messageId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UTTERANCE = #{utterance,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TYPE = #{type,jdbcType=TINYINT},
SATISFACTION_LEVEL = #{satisfactionLevel,jdbcType=TINYINT},
CATEGORY = #{category,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PRIORITY = #{priority,jdbcType=TINYINT},
CLUSTER_ID = #{clusterId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
TAGS = #{tags,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REASON = #{reason,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
HANDLER = #{handler,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
HANDLE_DATE = #{handleDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATION_DATE = #{creationDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
DEPT_ID = #{deptId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
COMPANY_NAME = #{companyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update BOT_UNAWARE_DETAIL set NODE_ID = #{nodeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, SERVER_ID = #{serverId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, SERVER_NAME = #{serverName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, REQUEST_ID = #{requestId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, AUTH_VENDOR = #{authVendor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MESSAGE_ID = #{messageId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UTTERANCE = #{utterance,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TYPE = #{type,jdbcType=TINYINT}, SATISFACTION_LEVEL = #{satisfactionLevel,jdbcType=TINYINT}, CATEGORY = #{category,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRIORITY = #{priority,jdbcType=TINYINT}, CLUSTER_ID = #{clusterId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, TAGS = #{tags,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REASON = #{reason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, HANDLER = #{handler,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, HANDLE_DATE = #{handleDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATION_DATE = #{creationDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, DEPT_ID = #{deptId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, COMPANY_NAME = #{companyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM BOT_UNAWARE_DETAIL ORDER BY CREATION_DATE LIMIT ${first}, ${pageSize}
SELECT * FROM BOT_UNAWARE_DETAIL WHERE CREATION_DATE >= #{lastCreateTime} ORDER BY CREATION_DATE LIMIT ${first},${pageSize}
SELECT * FROM BOT_UNAWARE_DETAIL WHERE MODIFICATION_DATE >= #{lastUpdateTime} ORDER BY MODIFICATION_DATE LIMIT #{first }, #{pageSize};
SELECT * FROM BOT_UNAWARE_DETAIL WHERE MODIFICATION_DATE > CREATION_DATE LIMIT #{first }, #{pageSize};
